Class QuerySecurityFilterer

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.accesscontrol.filter.query.QuerySecurityFilterer

public class QuerySecurityFilterer
extends java.lang.Object

This class will take care of applying the filter based on the indexes.

shouldFilter

public boolean shouldFilter()
If returns true will apply the filtering.

Returns:
- true - if the logged in user is not global

applyFilter

public void applyFilter(AbstractQuery query)
Will take care of applying the filter. Obtain the base query, then replace the base entity and its alias with "index name" and "index alias" then issue couple of joins with the entity.

Parameters:
query -
